CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL($User.LanguageLocaleKey,"pt_BR"),"Diálogo diário / semanal de segurança (DDS / DSS) / ","Tool-box talks")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: …are discussions held by individual work groups, usually in a “field” setting to raise HSEQ awareness for the day, or to specifically discuss potential hazards associated with an upcoming task.
